recipe.title: Turquoise Margarita
instructions: Rub lime slice around rim of each of 6 stemmed glasses. Reserve lime slice. Dip rims of glasses into salt. Combine Margarita mix and next 3 ingredients in blender. Blend until lime is finely minced. Add ice and blend until thick and smooth. Pour into glasses and garnish with lime slices.
